snippet: LEAD: Federal officials quashed an inquiry into drug trafficking at the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California just three days before the investigation reached the laboratory's most sensitive areas, and then they misled House investi...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Federal officials quashed an inquiry into drug trafficking at the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California just three days before the investigation reached the laboratory's most sensitive areas, and then they misled House investigators, a Congressional report charges.

headline.main: Drug Inquiry Was Quashed, House Report Charges

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND COMMERCE
